blueprint.description: Installs Ruby (as well as a configurable list of system or user level gems) on almost any platform
blueprint.overview: [Ruby](https://www.ruby-lang.org/en/) is an interpreted, high-level, general-purpose programming language. It was designed and developed in the mid-1990s by Yukihiro
Matsumoto in Japan. Ruby is dynamically typed and uses garbage collection.
blueprint.name: Ruby
blueprint.title: Ruby
